content_preview: Indulge in the Art ofLuxury ChocolateExperience the exquisite craftsmanship of Schmitten, where every piece tells a story of passion, tradition, and the finest ingredients.Explore CollectionsOur StoryScroll to discoverIndulge in Exquisite FlavorsHandcrafted with the finest ingredients, our chocolates are a symphony of taste and texture.Signature Truffle CollectionOur award-winning handcrafted truffles with ganache centers₹1,200View productDark Chocolate PralinesDelicate shells with luscious fillings and premium cocoa₹950View productArtisanal Chocolate BarsSingle-origin bars crafted with rare cocoa varieties₹650View productLuxury Assortment BoxA curated collection of our finest chocolates₹1,800View productExplore All CollectionsCrafted with Passion,Savored with PleasureAt Schmitten, we believe that chocolate is more than just a treat—it's an experience. Our master chocolatiers blend traditional techniques with innovative flavors to create chocolates that delight all your senses.From bea
